content: u r c h i n s a y s h a g r e e n e pattern notes urchin did you know that urchin shells were called tests the test is the sea urchins external skeleton this globe-like shape has bony plates that form shell providing protection for their soft inner parts the body of a sea urchin has radial symmetry which means that it is divided into five equal parts the urchin hat has a similar appearance with its lines of stockinette separating sections of seed stitch the design this is an easy stitch pattern of knits and purls knit with large needles and super bulky yarn which means it is also a quick knit the result is a seed stitch hat divided into sections by vertical columns of stockinette stitch pattern level beginner abbreviations bor beginning of round k knit k2tog knit two stitches together p purl p2tog purl two stitches together round s round s ssk slip-slip-knit slip two stitches knit-wise one at a time then knit the two stitches together through the back loops st s stitch es u r c h i n -
